Black and white mileage map Florida
Florida
Florida, Rand McNally black and white mileage map and hotel directory
Rand McNally black and white mileage map of Florida
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rand McNally and Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 31 x 47 cm, on sheet 35 x 53 cm, folded to 12 x 9 cm, in cover 17 x 11 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Inset: Lee, Broward, Dade, and Monroe counties. Monroe County includes the Florida Keys.
Index to principal cities in left margin.

Guide has title: Rand McNally black and white mileage map of Florida, hotel directory with rates and accomodations, rail mileage between cities, towns, and junctions, steam and electric railroads, all counties, index to towns with latest population figures, leading industries
